remarks: Convert a quantification over a triple to a disjunction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ralprg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ralprg.2 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
raltpg.3 $e |- ( x = C -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
rextpg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( E. x e. { A , B , C } ph <-> ( ps \/ ch \/ th ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
